Prometid.description: Prometid can be used to upgrade Laser Cannon and Rocket damage by 15%.

Duranium.description: Duranium can be used to upgrade speed and shield generators by 10%.

Promerium.description:
Promerium can increase damage of Laser Cannons and Rockets by 30%.
Speed and Shield generators can be increased by 20%.

Seprom.description:
Seprom can increase damage of Laser Cannons and Rockets by 60%.
Shield generators can be upgraded by 40%.

Osmium.description:
Seprom can increase damage of Laser Cannons and Rockets by 50%.
Shield generators can be upgraded by 50%.
